Posts.Content: Apr 11, 2008 09:00PM neverimaginedme wrote: Number one, you are right, if you feel you should be taken care of in a more timely manner, than advcate for yourelf, keep calling and calling and calling until people listen. Number, two, however, you need to be careful in your condition not to let the stress and worry of it lead you to more health problems. Speak up, get better care for yourself, but do not worry yourself to the point of poor health. Good luck.
